resources.string: Please help Run to gather an understanding of your attitude towards exercise.
Which statement is most reflective of your attitude towards exercising?

string-array.name: goal_question_array
string-array.item: I do not care about exercise
I care a lot about exercise.

resources.string: Which category best represents how often you exercise?
Do you notice your motivation towards exercise to increase when comparing yourself to others, or to a particular personal end goal.

string-array.name: goal_question_3_array
string-array.item: I am not motivated by these
I am slightly motivated by these
I am significantly motivated by these

resources.string: Please note: This information IS REQUIRED to provide an accurate estimate of your daily calories expended. This data will not be used for any other purpose.
What times of day do you wish to receive notifications?
Notify me between 8 am and 5 pm
The left icon displays your current daily step streak, and the right icon displays your all time highest step streak.
